pageProps.children:
Empowering and Accelerating Cloud-Native Development with Buildpacks.io
We will explore how Buildpacks.io can transform the way developers build, deploy, and manage applications in a cloud-native environment. We'll discuss the core concepts of buildpacks, their role in simplifying the build process, and how they enhance developer productivity by automating the creation of production-ready container images. Attendees will gain insights into best practices for integrating Buildpacks.io into their development workflows and see real-world examples of its impact on accelerating application delivery. Join us to discover how Buildpacks.io can empower your cloud-native development journey.

https://tag-app-delivery.cncf.io/blog/tag-app-delivery-at-kubecon-eu-2024/


Organized by TAG App Delivery - https://tag-app-delivery.cncf.io/

schema.name: Michel Murabito
schema.description: I am a Developer Advocate at Mia-Platform and a proud member of the CNCF TAG Environmental Sustainability. I am passionate about platform engineering, cloud native technologies, and sustainability. This page showcases the projects, groups, and activities I love to work on.

data.pageDescription: Michel Murabito talk's: Empowering and Accelerating Cloud-Native Development with Buildpacks.io
